column6: "THE APOCALYPSE SOLUTION," PART FOUR It all comes down to this!  To stop him from bending all reality to his will X-Force must kill Apocalypse.  But at a terrible cost. The final set piece: lovers positioned against each other, old friendships irreparably shattered, and the future of the Marvel Universe forever twisted. The story X-fans will be discussing for years to come, the conclusion that will change one character evermore!
column8: | editor:Axel Alonso | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller:Jerome Opena | writer:Rick Remender | penciller (cover):Esad Ribic | colorist:Dean White
